sentences.en: But, as the opinion poll shows, the party's standing with the people at large has never been so low.
sentences.cn: 但是，正如民意调查所显示的那样，该党在普通民众中的声望从来没这么低过。

sentences.en: As a composer he proved himself adept at large dramatic forms.
sentences.cn: 作为一名作曲家，他显示出自己擅长创作大型的戏剧体裁。

sentences.en: The man who tried to have her killed is still at large.
sentences.cn: 企图谋杀她的那个男人仍然逍遥法外。
